typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct INonfungiblePositionManager.MintParams memory) payable external returns (uint256,uint128,uint256,uint256)
function (struct INonfungiblePositionManager.CollectParams memory) payable external returns (uint256,uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Transfers the NFT to the owner
 @param tokenId The id of the erc721

collectAllFees(uint256).details: The contract must hold the erc721 token before it can collect fees
collectAllFees(uint256).notice: Collects the fees associated with provided liquidity

params.tokenId: The id of the erc721 token

returns.amount0: The amount of fees collected in token0
returns.amount1: The amount of fees collected in token1

decreaseLiquidityInHalf(uint256).notice: A function that decreases the current liquidity by half. An example to show how to call the `decreaseLiquidity` function defined in periphery.

params.tokenId: The id of the erc721 token

returns.amount0: The amount received back in token0
returns.amount1: The amount returned back in token1

increaseLiquidityCurrentRange(uint256,ui.details: Pool must be initialized already to add liquidity
increaseLiquidityCurrentRange(uint256,ui.notice: Increases liquidity in the current range

params.amount0: The amount to add of token0
params.amount1: The amount to add of token1
params.tokenId: The id of the erc721 token

mintNewPosition().notice: Calls the mint function defined in periphery, mints the same amount of each token. For this example we are providing 1000 DAI and 1000 USDC in liquidity

returns.liquidity: The amount of liquidity for the position
returns.tokenId: The id of the newly minted ERC721

retrieveNFT(uint256).notice: Transfers the NFT to the owner
